name: Bees & Bears
description:
Construct a hive full of bees to protect them against bear attacks, who want to take your honey. But don't take too long, cause your hive needs a new queen and she'll be born in a few months, prepare your hive for the birth of a new queen.

Send your bees out to gather nectar and pollen while you leave some to make honey and wax out of these. Don't forget to upgrade your surroundings by distributing the pollen of the flowers to make more flowers or even trees grow.

But be aware that not only bees eat that delicious honey you produce, you will also need to defend your hive against bear attacks or the game will be short lived.

Turn-based strategy game in which you build up your resources and defend what you created.
